title: CBIC Reports 'NIL' Indirect Tax Proposals for Budget Session 2026-27
content:
# CBIC Reports 'NIL' Indirect Tax Proposals for Budget Session 2026-27

Ek important update hai. The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) ne Ministry of Finance ko inform kiya hai ki Budget Session 2026-27 ke liye unke paas koi indirect tax proposals nahi hain.

*   **Office Memorandum (OM) Date:** This update comes via an Office Memorandum dated January 15, 2026, issued by the GST Policy Wing of the Department of Revenue.
*   **No Legislative or Non-Legislative Business:** The OM indicates "NIL" under both legislative and non-legislative business for the upcoming Budget Session of Parliament.
*   **Implication:** Iska matlab hai ki CBIC ki taraf se Budget 2026 mein GST ya Customs se related koi naye legislative changes ya policy changes propose nahi kiye ja rahe hain. This reflects a focus on stability in the indirect tax domain.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.cbic.gov.in)

*Published on: 20 January 2026*
